section.title: List Bills of Operations
section.para: To access the master list of Bills of Operations, select the "List Bills of Operations" option. The following screen will appear:
When viewing the Bills of Operations list, you will be presented with the following options:

listitem.para: To search for an Item, begin typing in the search field. As you type, the "Bills of Operations" list will automatically scroll toward the Item Number you are typing. For longer lists you can also search for Items manually by using the scroll bar to the right of the "Bills of Operations" list. You may also show Bills of Operations for Inactive Items by selecting that option.
Select to include inactive Bills of Operations in the list.
Select to include Bills of Operations for inactive Items in the list.

tip.para: You may not delete a Bill of Operations (BOO) if the Item in question has any Revision history. You must make the BOO inactive instead

section.para: The display lists Bills of Operations according to the options selected.
